recipesJson.name: Tres Leches | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
Tres Leches, meaning 3 milks, is a soft white cake infused with whole milk, condensed milk, and topped with a whipped cream frosting.  This is a recipe where MaxSavage and Folkart had never had the real thing, so Nachef was our guide into this wonderful dessert.  The FA Milk at 2.5% off the shake is a bit forward as a top note, but let it steep for a few days and it begins to blend well with the mix.  Full recipe notes at https://youtu.be/sW1fA-An8ws  .  

This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, and Folkart.
Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every other Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

![Legacy](https://i.imgur.com/97yskRE.png)


If you would like to support DEVELOPED, the best way is to check out our LEGACY one shot line at https://www.DIYFlavorChaser.com/developed

reviews.text: I make a 30 ml each week so.....yeah it's damn good! I'm not the best to describe what I taste and to dissect the mix but I'm here to say that I really enjoy this recipe, very nice job!
Tried this originally with FLV Caramel instead of JF Dulce De Leche and it was really good, but its way better with DDL and really accurate to the profile.
